message: Let's start fair. I'll take the lion's share, but you get a good chunk to start!
I think a more even split is fairer. This way, we both get a decent amount to start with.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still need a larger share to make this worthwhile. Let's split it 60/40 this time.
I think a 50/50 split is the fairest solution. We can both benefit from this, and it avoids the risk of losing everything later on.
